features.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4050 6GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2370MHz, TGP 105W
features.Audio: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
features.Speakers: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Audio
features.Headset Port: 1 x Headset (headphone and microphone combo) jack (3.5mm)
features.USB Ports:
3 x USB-A (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1)
1 x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with PD 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4
features.USB-C Port: 1 x USB-C (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with PD 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4
